monosodium glutamate.name: Monosodium Glutamate (MSG/E621)
monosodium glutamate.cause: Known to trigger allergic reactions and headaches in sensitive individuals. Used to induce obesity in lab studies.
monosodium glutamate.avoid: Individuals sensitive to MSG, migraine sufferers, patients with asthma.

high fructose corn syrup.name: High Fructose Corn Syrup (HFCS)
high fructose corn syrup.cause: Rapid blood sugar spike, linked to non-alcoholic fatty liver disease (NAFLD).
high fructose corn syrup.avoid: Patients with diabetes, pre-diabetes, and NAFLD.

refined vegetable oil.name: Refined Vegetable Oil (Excessive Consumption)
refined vegetable oil.cause: Often high in Omega-6 fatty acids, linked to inflammation and high cholesterol.
refined vegetable oil.avoid: Patients with heart disease, chronic inflammation, and high cholesterol.

sodium benzoate.name: Sodium Benzoate (E211)
sodium benzoate.cause: Can convert to carcinogen benzene when combined with Vitamin C; linked to hyperactivity in children.
sodium benzoate.avoid: Children with ADHD, individuals sensitive to preservatives.

potassium bromate.name: Potassium Bromate (Banned in India/FSSAI)
potassium bromate.cause: Known carcinogen, linked to thyroid and kidney tumors in animals.
potassium bromate.avoid: All consumers. (Flagged due to historical ban and severe risk).

titanium dioxide.name: Titanium Dioxide (E171)
titanium dioxide.cause: Concerns regarding DNA damage and potential carcinogenicity (banned in EU).

carrageenan.name: Carrageenan (E407)
carrageenan.cause: Linked to chronic intestinal inflammation and digestive distress.
carrageenan.avoid: Individuals with Inflammatory Bowel Disease (IBD), Crohn's, or Ulcerative Colitis.

red 40.name: Allura Red AC (Red 40 / E129)
red 40.cause: Linked to hyperactivity and allergic reactions in children.

tartrazine.name: Tartrazine (Yellow 5 / E102)
tartrazine.cause: Common trigger for asthma symptoms, hives, and hyperactivity.
tartrazine.avoid: Asthma sufferers, individuals with aspirin sensitivity.

butylated hydroxyanisole.name: BHA (Butylated Hydroxyanisole / E320)
butylated hydroxyanisole.cause: Suspected endocrine disruptor and carcinogen in high doses.
butylated hydroxyanisole.avoid: All consumers, especially those with hormonal sensitivities.

propyl gallate.name: Propyl Gallate (E310)
propyl gallate.cause: Linked to cancer in animal studies.

trans fat.name: Trans Fat / Partially Hydrogenated Oil
trans fat.cause: Significantly raises bad cholesterol (LDL) and lowers good cholesterol (HDL).
trans fat.avoid: All consumers, especially those with cardiovascular issues.

hydrolyzed vegetable protein.name: Hydrolyzed Vegetable Protein (HVP)
hydrolyzed vegetable protein.cause: Often contains processed free glutamate (like MSG), triggering sensitivities.

milk solids.name: Milk Solids / Dairy Powders
milk solids.cause: A concentrated source of lactose and dairy protein.
milk solids.avoid: Individuals with lactose intolerance or milk protein allergy.

maltodextrin.name: Maltodextrin
maltodextrin.cause: High glycemic index, spiking blood sugar rapidly.

salt.name: Excessive Sodium Chloride (Salt)
salt.cause: Causes water retention, leading to increased blood volume and blood pressure.
salt.avoid: Patients with hypertension, kidney disease, or fluid retention issues.

sugar.name: Excessive Sucrose (Sugar)
sugar.cause: Contributes to weight gain, high blood sugar, and insulin resistance.
sugar.avoid: Patients with diabetes, pre-diabetes, and obesity.

atta.name: Whole Wheat Flour (Atta)
atta.avoid: Individuals with Celiac Disease or gluten sensitivity.

maida.name: Refined Wheat Flour (Maida)
maida.cause: Contains gluten and is highly processed (high glycemic index).
maida.avoid: Individuals with Celiac Disease, diabetes, or those managing weight.

besan.name: Gram Flour (Besan/Chickpea Flour)
besan.cause: High fiber content, may cause bloating in sensitive individuals.
besan.avoid: Individuals with severe fiber sensitivity or chickpea allergy.

ghee.name: Ghee (Clarified Butter)
ghee.avoid: Individuals with high LDL cholesterol or severe heart disease (limit intake).

mustard oil.name: Mustard Oil
mustard oil.cause: Contains high levels of Erucic Acid (when raw, though regulated in India).
mustard oil.avoid: Infants/young children (due to Erucic Acid concern).

turmeric.name: Turmeric Powder (Haldi)
turmeric.cause: Generally safe, but high intake can thin blood.

ajwain.name: Carom Seeds (Ajwain)
ajwain.avoid: Individuals with severe GERD or stomach ulcers (may increase acid).

hing.name: Asafoetida (Hing)
hing.cause: Can cause digestive issues (gas, diarrhea) in large amounts.
hing.avoid: Pregnant women (in high doses, consult physician).

tamarind.name: Tamarind Paste (Imli)
tamarind.avoid: Individuals with severe GERD or acid reflux.

e102.name: Tartrazine (E102)
e102.cause: Linked to hyperactivity and asthma symptoms.

e133.name: Brilliant Blue FCF (E133)
e133.cause: Linked to allergic reactions and hyperactivity.

e250.name: Sodium Nitrite (E250)
e250.cause: Used in processed meats; forms carcinogenic nitrosamines when heated.
e250.avoid: Individuals with hypertension (high sodium), cancer risk.

e635.name: Disodium 5'-Ribonucleotides (E635)
e635.cause: Flavor enhancer often used with MSG; may worsen gout.

e466.name: Carboxymethyl cellulose (E466/Cellulose Gum)
e466.cause: Emulsifier linked to gut inflammation and dysbiosis in animal studies.
e466.avoid: Individuals with IBD or chronic digestive issues.

e330.name: Citric Acid (E330) - Synthetic
e330.cause: Highly acidic; can erode tooth enamel and trigger acid reflux/GERD.
e330.avoid: Individuals with severe GERD or compromised tooth enamel.

e282.name: Calcium Propionate (E282)
e282.cause: Common bread preservative; linked to insulin resistance and behavioral changes.

e951.name: Aspartame (E951)
e951.cause: Artificial sweetener; contains phenylalanine; suspected link to migraines and neurological issues.

e412.name: Guar Gum (E412)
e412.cause: May cause severe bloating/gas in large amounts.

e300.name: Ascorbic Acid (E300)
e300.cause: Generally safe, but high dose can cause diarrhea.

e322.name: Lecithin (E322)
e322.cause: Emulsifier, often soy or egg derived.

rapeseed oil.name: Canola/Rapeseed Oil
rapeseed oil.cause: Generally safe, high in monounsaturated fats.

onion powder.name: Onion Powder
onion powder.avoid: Individuals with IBS or FODMAP sensitivity.

garlic powder.name: Garlic Powder
garlic powder.avoid: Individuals with IBS or FODMAP sensitivity.

red chilli powder.name: Red Chilli Powder
red chilli powder.avoid: Individuals with Ulcers or severe GERD.

ginger powder.name: Ginger Powder (Sonth)
ginger powder.cause: Can exacerbate acid reflux in high doses.

amchur.name: Dried Mango Powder (Amchur)
amchur.avoid: Individuals with GERD or Acid Reflux.

vegetable shortening.name: Vegetable Shortening (Vanaspati)
vegetable shortening.cause: Often contains Trans Fats/High Saturated Fat.

artificial flavour.name: Artificial Flavouring Agents
artificial flavour.cause: Potential for allergic or sensitivity reactions.

artificial colour.name: Artificial Colouring Agents
artificial colour.cause: Potential for hyperactivity (ADHD) and allergic reactions.

natural colour.name: Natural Colouring Agent
natural colour.cause: Generally safe, but specific source may be an allergen.

artificial sweetener.name: Artificial Sweeteners (General)
artificial sweetener.cause: Various side effects including digestive issues and migraines.
artificial sweetener.avoid: Individuals with sensitive digestive systems, migraine sufferers.

sucralose.name: Sucralose (E955)
sucralose.cause: Artificial sweetener; suspected gut health disruption.
sucralose.avoid: Individuals with IBD or digestive issues.

polydextrose.name: Polydextrose (E1200)
polydextrose.cause: Used as a fiber replacement; can cause bloating/gas in large amounts.

fructose.name: Fructose (Concentrated)
fructose.cause: High sugar content; can lead to NAFLD.

modified starch.name: Modified Starch
modified starch.cause: Often high glycemic index; source may be an allergen.
modified starch.avoid: Individuals with Diabetes or specific grain allergies.

potassium chloride.name: Potassium Chloride
potassium chloride.cause: Can be problematic for kidney function in large amounts.

ponceau 4r.name: Ponceau 4R (E124)
ponceau 4r.cause: Synthetic azo dye; linked to hyperactivity, banned in several countries.
ponceau 4r.avoid: Children, individuals with asthma or aspirin sensitivity.

sunset yellow fcf.name: Sunset Yellow FCF (E110)
sunset yellow fcf.cause: Synthetic azo dye; linked to hyperactivity and stomach upsets.

carmoisine.name: Carmoisine (E122)
carmoisine.cause: Synthetic azo dye; linked to hyperactivity and possible allergic reactions.

indigotine.name: Indigotine (Indigo Carmine / E132)
indigotine.cause: Synthetic color; can cause nausea, high blood pressure, and skin reactions.
indigotine.avoid: Individuals with high blood pressure or known sensitivities.

fast green fcf.name: Fast Green FCF (E143)
fast green fcf.cause: Synthetic color; linked to tumor growth in animals.

erythrosine.name: Erythrosine (Red 3 / E127)
erythrosine.cause: Synthetic color; linked to thyroid tumors in animal studies (restricted by FDA).

quinolone yellow.name: Quinolone Yellow (E104)
quinolone yellow.cause: Linked to hyperactivity and potential allergic reactions.

brilliant black bn.name: Brilliant Black BN (E151)
brilliant black bn.cause: Synthetic color; can cause allergic reactions, especially in asthma patients.

sulphur dioxide.name: Sulphur Dioxide (E220)
sulphur dioxide.cause: Sulfiting agent; severe asthma trigger and linked to allergic reactions.
sulphur dioxide.avoid: Asthma sufferers, individuals with sulfite sensitivity.

sodium metabisulphite.name: Sodium Metabisulphite (E223)
sodium metabisulphite.cause: Sulfite agent; common asthma and allergy trigger.

potassium sorbate.name: Potassium Sorbate (E202)
potassium sorbate.cause: Preservative; generally safe but can cause skin irritation and mild allergic reactions.

calcium propionate.name: Calcium Propionate (E282)
calcium propionate.cause: Common bread preservative; linked to insulin resistance and behavioral issues in children.

butylated hydroxytoluene.name: BHT (Butylated Hydroxytoluene / E321)
butylated hydroxytoluene.cause: Antioxidant; linked to cancer and neurological issues in animal studies.

sorbic acid.name: Sorbic Acid (E200)
sorbic acid.cause: Preservative; low toxicity but can cause mild irritation or allergic reactions.

polysorbate 80.name: Polysorbate 80 (E433)
polysorbate 80.cause: Emulsifier; linked to gut inflammation, dysbiosis, and metabolic syndrome in animal studies.
polysorbate 80.avoid: Individuals with IBD or chronic digestive issues.

polysorbate 60.name: Polysorbate 60 (E435)
polysorbate 60.cause: Emulsifier; linked to gut inflammation and dysbiosis.
polysorbate 60.avoid: Individuals with IBD or chronic digestive issues.

propylene glycol alginate.name: Propylene Glycol Alginate (E405)
propylene glycol alginate.cause: Stabilizer; generally safe, but can affect nutrient absorption.

locust bean gum.name: Locust Bean Gum (E410)
locust bean gum.cause: Thickener; can cause bloating, gas, and digestive discomfort in large amounts.

tragacanth gum.name: Tragacanth Gum (E413)
tragacanth gum.cause: Thickener; can rarely cause allergic reactions.

soya.name: Soy / Soya
soya.cause: Common allergen; soy protein concentrate/isolate can disrupt thyroid function.
soya.avoid: Individuals with Soy Allergy, those with thyroid conditions.

wheat.name: Wheat (Maida / Atta / Rava)
wheat.avoid: Individuals with Celiac Disease or gluten sensitivity.

refined rice flour.name: Refined Rice Flour
refined rice flour.avoid: Individuals with diabetes or blood sugar control issues.

vegetable fat.name: Vegetable Fat / Vanaspati
vegetable fat.cause: Often contains trans fats and high saturated fat (linked to heart disease).
vegetable fat.avoid: Individuals with heart disease or high cholesterol.

acesulfame k.name: Acesulfame Potassium (Acesulfame K / E950)
acesulfame k.cause: Artificial sweetener; may interfere with metabolic function.

saccharin.name: Saccharin (E954)
saccharin.cause: Artificial sweetener; low risk but under historic scrutiny.

maltitol.name: Maltitol (E965)
maltitol.avoid: Individuals with IBS or severe digestive sensitivity.

sodium acid pyrophosphate.name: Sodium Acid Pyrophosphate (SAPP / E450)
sodium acid pyrophosphate.cause: High phosphate/sodium content; can affect kidney and heart health.
sodium acid pyrophosphate.avoid: Patients with kidney disease or hypertension.

calcium sulphate.name: Calcium Sulphate (E516)
calcium sulphate.cause: Excessive intake can contribute to kidney stones.

potassium carbonate.name: Potassium Carbonate (E501)
potassium carbonate.cause: Generally safe, but high potassium can be dangerous.
potassium carbonate.avoid: Individuals with kidney disease (due to potassium regulation).

fumaric acid.name: Fumaric Acid (E297)
fumaric acid.cause: Acidulant; generally safe but may cause mouth and stomach irritation.
fumaric acid.avoid: Individuals with severe acid reflux or ulcers.

lactic acid.name: Lactic Acid (E270)
lactic acid.cause: Acidulant; generally safe, but can irritate ulcers.

tartaric acid.name: Tartaric Acid (E334)
tartaric acid.cause: Acidulant; can have a laxative effect in large doses.

asafoetida.name: Asafoetida (Hing)
asafoetida.cause: Can cause digestive issues (gas, diarrhea) in large amounts.
asafoetida.avoid: Pregnant women (in high doses, consult physician).

fenugreek.name: Fenugreek Seeds (Methi)
fenugreek.cause: Known to significantly lower blood sugar.
fenugreek.avoid: Patients on diabetes medication (consult physician due to risk of hypoglycemia).

poppy seeds.name: Poppy Seeds (Khus Khus)
poppy seeds.cause: Potential for false positive drug tests (rare).

ajinomoto.name: Ajinomoto (Common name for MSG)
ajinomoto.cause: Known to trigger allergic reactions and headaches in sensitive individuals.

chloropropanols.name: Chloropropanols (In Soy/Oyster Sauce)
chloropropanols.cause: Contaminants found in sauces; linked to cancer.

metanil yellow.name: Metanil Yellow (Illegal Dye)
metanil yellow.cause: Illegal food dye; toxic and linked to neurological damage.

rhodamine b.name: Rhodamine B (Illegal Dye)
rhodamine b.cause: Illegal textile dye; toxic and linked to cancer.

erucic acid.name: Erucic Acid (High Levels)
erucic acid.cause: High levels in certain oils (mustard, sassafras) linked to heart damage.
erucic acid.avoid: Infants/young children, individuals with heart conditions.
